adaptive.title: Adaptive
adaptive.text: Cycles between building up Physical Resistance or Energy Resistance every 8 seconds.

aegis_heavy1.title: Aegis (Heavy) 1
aegis_heavy1.text: The Defender begins with 2 Indestructible charges. Each Heavy Attack strike againts the Defender removes 1 charge.

aggression.title: Aggression
aggression.text: Every 2 seconds on a timer gain a {0} passive increasing Attack by 50% per stack.  When struck reset the timer and remove the {0} passive stack

aggressionarmor.title: Aggression: Armor
aggressionarmor.text: Every 2 seconds on a timer, gain an Armor Up Passive increasing Armor by 50% per stack. When struck, reset the timer and remove an Armor Up passive stack.

aggressionfury.title: Aggression: Fury
aggressionfury.text: Every 2 seconds on a timer, gain a Fury passive increasing Attack by 50% per stack. When struck, reset the timer and remove a Fury passive stack.

aggressionprowess.title: Aggression: Prowess
aggressionprowess.text: Every 2 seconds on a timer, gain a Prowess Passive increasing Special Attack damage by 50% per stack. When struck, reset the timer and remove a Fury passive stack.

aggressionregeneration.title: Aggression: Regeneration
aggressionregeneration.text: Every 2 seconds on a timer, gain a Regeneration Passive that heals for 0.25% of max health every second per stack. When struck, reset the timer and remove a Fury passive stack.

aggressive.title: Aggressive
aggressive.text: This defender is more agfressive and excels at offensive abilities like Heavy and Dash Attacks.

allornothing.title: All or Nothing
allornothing.text: This Champion stores Power until its third Special Attack is ready.

arcoverload2.title: Arc Overload 2.0
arcoverload2.text: An Arc Overload triggers every 20 seconds.

armorbreakimmunity.title: Armor Break Immunity
armorbreakimmunity.text: The Defender is Immune to Armor Break Debuffs.

aspectofevolution.title: Aspect of Evolution
aspectofevolution.text: Whenever this defender fills a bar of Power, they raise their Attack, Armor, Critical Rating, Critical Resistance, Block Penetration, Power Rate, and Ability Accuracy attributes by 5% for the remainder of the fight.

backuprecovery1.title: Backup Recovery - 1
backuprecovery1.text: When brough below 50% health the Defender gains a burst of 20% power. If a reducton to Ability Accuracy prevents this, the defender instead recovers 15% Max Health.

bane.title: Bane
bane.text: The Attacker begins under the effect of a Curse, which deals 0.50% of the opponents current health as Direct Damage per second.  Whenever a Champion with the Curse strikes the other Champion or if the Curse has been on the same Champion for 10 seconds, it passes to the other Champion.

baneofdamballah.title: Bane of Damballah
baneofdamballah.text: The defender deals 50% additional damage and has 10% Life Steal as long as their target is under a beneficial effect.

biohazard.title: Biohazard
biohazard.text: When stuck, 20% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 100% of Attack as direct damage over 7.50 seconds. When Blocking an attack 50% chance to inflict Poison, dealing 100% of Attack as direct damage over 7.50 seconds.

bleed100.title: Bleed
bleed100.text: Inflicts Bleed draining 100% Health over 60 seconds.

bloodinthewater.title: Blood In The Water
bloodinthewater.text: While the Attacker is suffering from a Debuff the Defender gains a Passive Fury granting +{0}% Attack Rating lasting until all Debuffs on the Attacker expire.

bloodletting.title: Bloodletting
bloodletting.text: Increase duration of Bleed effects by 100%

boostbuff1.title: Boost Buff (Armor Up) 1
boostbuff1.text: The Defender's Armor Up Buffs gain +25% duration and Ability Accuracy. When struck with a Critical Hit, the Defender will remove 1 Armor Up Buff to reduce the damage to 0.

boostbuff2.title: Boost Buff (Armor Up) 2
boostbuff2.text: The Defender's Armor Up Buffs gain +X% duration and Ability Accuracy. When struck with a Critical Hit, the Defender will remove 1 Armor Up Buff to reduce the damage to 0.

boostbuff3.title: Boost Buff (Armor Up) 3
boostbuff3.text: The Defender's Armor Up Buffs gain +X% duration and Ability Accuracy. When struck with a Critical Hit, the Defender will remove 1 Armor Up Buff to reduce the damage to 0.

breakthrough.title: Breakthrough
breakthrough.text: The Champion starts with +5,000 Armor Rating, but the Opponent reduces their Armor Rating by 200 with each hit.

bruteforce.title: Brute Force
bruteforce.text: If the Opponent hasn't landed a hit in 6 seconds they begin to Degenerate losing 100% of their total Health over 30 seconds. Landing a hit removes the Degeneration and resets the timer. The strength of this Degeneration is affected by Class Relationships.

buffduration.title: Buff Duration
buffduration.text: All Buffs for this champion last {0}% longer.

buffet.title: Buffet
buffet.text: Every 7 seconds the next Buff triggered by the attacker is immedieatly removed. Each time the efect triggers they Regenerate {0}% of their Max Health.

buffimbalance-powerdrain.title: Buff Imbalance - Power Drain
buffimbalance-powerdrain.text: Whenever the Defender gains a Buff, the Attacker receives an indefinite Power Drain Debuff, draining 10% of a Bar of Power every 6 second(s). These Power Drains are all removed when the Attacker lands a Special Attack.

buffimbalance-weakness.title: Buff Imbalance - Weakness
buffimbalance-weakness.text: Whenever the Defender gains a Buff, the Attacker receives an indefinite Weakness, decreasing Attack Rating by 15%. These Weaknesses are all removed when the Attacker lands a Special Attack.

bufftoggleunstoppable1.title: Buff Toggle (Unstoppable) 1
bufftoggleunstoppable1.text: Every 10 seconds, the Defender gains an Unstoppable Buff for 2 seconds.

burdenofmight.title: Burden of Might
burdenofmight.text: The Opponent's Power Gained by striking or being struck by their opponent is reduced by 15% for each Buff currently active on them. Additionally each time a Buff activates on them for any reason, they lose 25% of their Max Power.

caltrops.title: Caltrops
caltrops.text: Dashing backwards against this enemy causes you to Bleed for 6 seconds.

checkmate.title: Checkmate
checkmate.text: Attacks ignore Armor and Evasion with a Combo of 15 or more.

chitinousthorns.title: Chitinous Thorns
chitinousthorns.text: If the Defender has an Armor Up Buff, the Attacker is inflicted with a Bleed Debuff causing 50% of the Defender's Attack over 5 seconds, each time Contact is made.

coldturkey1.title: Cold Turkey 1
coldturkey1.text: Whenever the Attacker purifies a Debuff they receive a burst of Degeneration Damage dealing a {0}% Attack

coldturkey2.title: Cold Turkey 2
coldturkey2.text: Whenever the Attacker purifies a Debuff they receive a burst of Degeneration Damage dealing a 30% Attack

coldturkey3.title: Cold Turkey 3
coldturkey3.text: Whenever the Attacker purifies a Debuff they receive a burst of Degeneration Damage dealing a X% Attack

combolock.title: Combo Lost
combolock.text: The Combo Meter is not reset while fighting this enemy.

comboshield.title: Combo Shield
comboshield.text: The Combo Meter is not reset after being struck by an attack.

cornered.title: Cornered
cornered.text: Whenever a damage over time Debuff is applied to the Champion, they gain {0}% mode power for the duration of the Debuff.

countertactics.title: Counter Tactics
countertactics.text: The Defender increases Base Attack by 20% for each hit of the Attacker's Combo Meter.

crumblingarmor.title: Crumbling Armor
crumblingarmor.text: If the attacker hasn't landed a hit in 6 seconds they receive and Armor Break Debuff, reducing their Armor by 250. If an Armor Break is active on the Attacker when they trigger an Armor Up Buff, an additional Armor Break Debuff is triggered. Landing a hit removes an Armor Break and resets the timer.

defensive.title: Defensive
defensive.text: This defender is more passive and excels at defensive abilities like Blocking and Dodging.

degeneration.title: Degeneration
degeneration.text: Inflicts Health Degeneration, draining 0.6% health per second.

degeneration08.title: Degeneration
degeneration08.text: Inflicts Health Degeneration, draining 0.8% health per second.

dismay.title: Dismay
dismay.text: Whenever the Attacker loses their highest achieved Combo in a fight, they gain a Degeneration Debuff that deals damage every second equal to {0} times the lost Combo.

dulled.title: Dulled
dulled.text: Critical Chance is reduced by 50% for each Buff active on you and each Debuff active on your Opponent.

ebbandflow-intercept.title: Ebb and Flow - Intercept
ebbandflow-intercept.text: The Defender has Protection, reducing all incoming damage by 60%. Intercepting the Defender removes the Protection and grants the Attacker a Precision Passive, increasing Critical Rating by 30% for 6 second(s). When the Precision expires, the Protection returns, and all Debuffs on the Defender are Purified.

ebbandflow-knockdown.title: Ebb and Flow - Knock Down
ebbandflow-knockdown.text: The Defender has Protection, reducing all incoming damage by 60%. Knocking down the Defender removes the Protection and grants the Attacker a Fury Passive, increasing Attack Rating by 40% for 12 second(s). When the Fury expires, the Protection returns, and all Debuffs on the Defender are Purified.

electricfluctuations.title: Electric Fluctuations
electricfluctuations.text: The duration of the Attacker's Buffs is reduced by 1.50 seconds, and if they are a Robot they suffer 50% reduced Ability Accuracy

empmodification.title: E.M.P. Modification
empmodification.text: Whenever the attackera gains a Buff, the Defender gains an Overclock charge. Max 10 stacks. For each charge, the Defender deals +15% Energy Damage with each strike Defender's Special Attacks convert all charges into Passive Shocks, each dealing 25% of Attack as Energy Damage over 10 seconds.

empoweredimmunity.title: Empowered Immunity
empoweredimmunity.text: Whenever this champion would receive a debuff they are immune to, they generate {0}% of a Bar of Power.

encroachingstun.title: Encroaching Stun
encroachingstun.text: Every 20 seconds the Attacker becomes Stunned for 3 seconds, unless they are performing a Special Attack when the timer expires. During the Stun, the Attacker's Armor Rating is doubled.

energize.title: Energize
energize.text: Increase the Defender's Combat Power Rate by {0}%. This is the Power that is gained by landing hits or being struck with the opponent.

enhancedarmorbreak.title: Enhanced Armor Break
enhancedarmorbreak.text: Armor Break abilities are 40% more effective.

enhancedarmorup.title: Enhanced Armor Up
enhancedarmorup.text: Armor Up abilities are 40% more effective.

enhancedcritbuff.title: Enhanced Critical Buffs
enhancedcritbuff.text: Critical Rate and Damage abilities are 40% more effective.

enhancedsp1.title: Enhanced Special 1
enhancedsp1.text: Special 1 deals 30% more damage and cannot be Blocked.

enhancedsp2.title: Enhanced Special 2
enhancedsp2.text: Special 2 deals 20% more damage and cannot be Blocked.

enhancedweakening.title: Enhanced Weakening
enhancedweakening.text: Weakness and Fatigue abbilities are {0}% more effective.

explosivepersonality.title: Explosive Personality
explosivepersonality.text: When the Defender Blocks an attack they activate an Armor Up Buff boosting Armor by 25%. Upon reaching 5 stacks of Armor Up generated by Explosive Personality, Armor Up stacks explode and remove 25% of the Attacker's Max Health.

extend.title: Extend
extend.text: The Defender's Buffs and Debuffs inflicted last 150% longer.

featsofpower.title: Feats of Power
featsofpower.text: When above 1 Bar or Power, gain a Fury Buff. When above 2 Bars of Power, gain a Precision Buff. When at 3 Bars of Power, gain a Cruelty Buff.

fissure.title: Fissure
fissure.text: Every attack tears and ruptures enemy Armor, inflicting a stacking 1% Armor Break.

flare.title: Flare
flare.text: The Opponent gains +300% Attack, but Degenerates 100% of their Max Health over 60 seconds. The strength of the Degeneration is affected by Class Relationships.

footloose.title: Footloose
footloose.text: After activating a Special Attack, the Defender becomes Unstoppable and has a X% chance to Evade incoming attacks for X seconds.

forceofwill.title: Force Of Will
forceofwill.text: The Defender is Immune to Ability Accuracy Modification.

fury10.title: Fury
fury10.text: A 10% chance to gain Fury, boosting Attack by 100% for 8 seconds.

godslayer.title: Godslayer
godslayer.text: Special Attacks benefit from 50% incresed Critical Hit Damage.

greatererosion.title: Greater Block Erosion
greatererosion.text: Whenever Block Proficiency or Perfect Block Chance exceeds 66%, up to 2% is lost per second until 66% remains.

hazardshift-incineratepoison.title: Hazard Shift - Incinerate, Poison
hazardshift-incineratepoison.text: Striking the Defender has a 40% chance to inflict the Attacker with an Incinerate Debuff, dealing [30%Atk] Damage over 7 second(s). Every 12 second(s), this is swapped for a chance to inflict Poison instead

healblock.title: Heal Block
healblock.text: Prevent the target from recovering Health.

healblock_passive.title: Heal Block - Passive
healblock_passive.text: The attacker is permanently affected by a Passive Heal Block.

healblock_special.title: Heal Block
healblock_special.text: Special Attacks inflict Heal Block, preventing the target from recovering health for 10 seconds.

heavyhanded.title: Heavy-Handed
heavyhanded.text: Special Damage increased based on Armor.

hurtlocker.title: Hurt Locker
hurtlocker.text: Using the same type of Special Attack twice in a row gives the Attacker a Delayed Blast charge for 5 seconds which may be removed by landing a Heavy Attack. If the Blast expires, the Attacker takes 50% of their Health as direct damage.

improvedpower.title: Improved Power Gain
improvedpower.text: Increases all Power this Defender receives from Power Gain Effects by {0}%.

indomitable.title: Indomitable
indomitable.text: The Defender's healing abilities can't be reversed, when this would occur they're instead only Heal Blocked.

infinityblast.title: Infinity Blast
infinityblast.text: Blasts a portion of remaning Health. Effectiveness changes to match the Class Relationship of both Champions.

kineticreactor.title: Kinetic Reactor
kineticreactor.text: This enemy generates Power when stiking a Blocking target.

kinetictransference.title: Kinetic Transference
kinetictransference.text: Blocked attacks cause the Defender to gain {0}% Power. If the Blocked attack dealt 0 damage, the amount of Power gained is doubled.

kingofhellskitchen.title: King of Hell's Kitchen
kingofhellskitchen.text: Heavy Attacks gain +60% Attack and cannot trigger a Passive Evade.

lifetransfer.title: Life Transfer
lifetransfer.text: The opponent suffers a permanent Degeneration effect losing 2% of their Max Health per second, but Lifestealing 125% of their Damage done. The Lifesteal percentage is affected by Class Relationships.

limber.title: Limber
limber.text: Each time this enemy is Stunned, they reduce the duration of Stuns by {0} seconds.

limber_percent.title: Limber
limber_percent.text: Each time the Defender receives a Stun Debuff, they reduce the Duration of further Stun Debuffs by {0}%.

limitedimmunity.title: Limited Immunity
limitedimmunity.text: Defender is Immune to all Debuffs for the first {0} seconds of the fight.

lionheart.title: Lionheart
lionheart.text: Whenever the Defender's healing abilities would be reduced or reversedby a Debuff, they aren't reversed, gain +300% potency, and the Defender deals 200% of their Attack as Direct Damage to the Attacker over 5 seconds.

longdistancerelationship.title: Long Distance Relationship
longdistancerelationship.text: While close to the Defender, the Attacker gains a Weakness Debuffs every X seconds, reducing their attack by X% permanently. Staying away from the Defender causes these Weakness effects to gradually fall off.

loss.title: Degeneration
loss.text: Inflicts health degeneration, draining 100% health per second.

masochism.title: Masochism
masochism.text: Every 7 seconds the next Debuff triggered on this Champion is immedieatly removed. Each time the efect triggers they Regenerate 5% of their Max Health.

matador.title: Matador
matador.text: The Attacker gains 1 Bar of Power every time the Defender Activates a Special Attack. This is the only way the Attacker can gain Power in this fight.

maximumoverdrive.title: Maximum Overdrive
maximumoverdrive.text: When Punisher 2099 Batter reaches intervals of exactly 25%, he gains 25% of his Max Power over 5 seconds.

mightycharge1.title: Mighty-Charge 1
mightycharge1.text: While performing a Medium dash attack, Defender is immune to Debuffs.

mirrorimage.title: Mirror Image
mirrorimage.text: Automatically mirrors the beneficial effects of enemies.

mixmaster.title: Mix Master
mixmaster.text: If the Attacker attempts the same Basic Attack twice in a row the Defender has a 100% chance to Evade the second Attack.

mysticward.title: Mystic Ward
mysticward.text: Enemy Nullify effects have a {0}% chance to fail.

mysticwardI.title: Mystic Ward I
mysticwardI.text: Enemy Nullify effects have a 65% chance to fail.

mysticwardII.title: Mystic Ward II
mysticwardII.text: Enemy Nullify effects have a 80% chance to fail.

mysticwardIII.title: Mystic Ward III
mysticwardIII.text: Enemy Nullify effects have a 95% chance to fail.

opportunist1.title: Opportunist 1
opportunist1.text: This Defender gains +10% Attack for each Buff on them.

opportunist2.title: Opportunist 2
opportunist2.text: This Defender gains +30% Attack for each Buff on them.

opportunist3.title: Opportunist 3
opportunist3.text: This Defender gains +50% Attack for each Buff on them.

oppressivecurse.title: Oppressive Curse
oppressivecurse.text: When Morningstar is Blocked, she gains a Soul Charge. Slight delay between Opressive Curse activations.

optimist.title: Optimist
optimist.text: Gains Fury, Armor Up, Health Steal as long as they remain below 25% HP.

oscilate.title: Oscilate
oscilate.text: Every 15 seconds, the Defender alternates between a Fury passive increasing Base Attack by 110% and an Armor Up/Crit Resistance passive increasing Armor and Crit Resist by 500.

outlast.title: Outlast
outlast.text: Reduces damage by up to 20% proportionate to missing health.

personalspace.title: Personal Space
personalspace.text: While the Attacker is close to the Defender, the Defender gains a Fury Buff every 3 seconds, increasing their attack by 10% permanently. Staying far away from the Defender causes these Fury effects to gradually fall off.

pessimist.title: Pessimist
pessimist.text: Gains Fury, Armor Up, and Health Steal as long as they remain above 75% HP

plaguedmind.title: Plagued Mind
plaguedmind.text: Attacker's Power is drained every {0} seconds.

poison.title: Poison
poison.text: Inflicts Poison every 7 seconds, dealing 160% of this champion's Attack as direct damage over 32 seconds

poison100.title: Poison
poison100.text: Inflicts Poison draining 100% Health over 60 seconds.

polkadotpower.title: Polka Dot Power
polkadotpower.text: The Attacker gains no Power from landing or receiving attacks, instead they are granted 12% of a Power Bar per second while the Defender is suffering from a damaging debuff.

powerbond.title: Power Bond
powerbond.text: Attacker's Power draining abilities are {0}% less effective.

powerdrain.title: Power Drain
powerdrain.text: Special Attacks drain up to 100% Power.

powerfocus1.title: Power Focus 1
powerfocus1.text: The Defender gains 60% Power Rate while below 1 Bar of Power but suffers -80% Power Rate while above.

powerfocus2.title: Power Focus 2
powerfocus2.text: The Defender gains X% Power Rate while below 1 Bar of Power but suffers -X% Power Rate while above.

powerfocus3.title: Power Focus 3
powerfocus3.text: The Defender gains X% Power Rate while below 1 Bar of Power but suffers -X% Power Rate while above.

powerfulfromafar.title: Powerful From Afar
powerfulfromafar.text: Each time the Attacker leaves striking distance, the Defender gains a Power Gain Buff. When entering striking distance the Buff is removed.

powerleak.title: Power Leak
powerleak.text: A 50% chance for Critical Hits to cause Power to leak from opponents over time.

powerreserve.title: Power Reserve
powerreserve.text: Special Attacks for both Champions cost 50% less Power.

powershield.title: Power Shield
powershield.text: The Attackers basic attacks deal no damage, but still generate power, and their Special Attacks deal 400% mode damage.

powersnack.title: Power Snack
powersnack.text: Every 7 seconds the next Buff triggered by the Attacker is immediatelly Nullified. Each time this effect triggers, the Defender gains 25% of a bar of power.

powerstruggle.title: Power Struggle
powerstruggle.text: The Attacker cannot gain Power during the fight through normal means. Each time the Defender reaches a full bar of Power, the Attacker is granted one as well and whenever the Defender launches a Special Attack, the Attacker loses an equal amount of Power.

rage.title: Rage
rage.text: Damage take in a single hit is capped at 2.5% of Max Health.  When damage cap is reached, gain a Fury Buff. Upon reaching 5 Fury Buffs activated by Rage, attacks become Unblockable. Ability Accuracy modification doesn't afect this Node.

ragnarok.title: Ragnarok
ragnarok.text: Stunning this enemy makes them Furious, while the Stuns they inflict can break even the toughest Armor.

rapidmetabolism1.title: Rapid Metabolism 1
rapidmetabolism1.text: This Defender shrugs off Debuffs 40% sooner.

rapidmetabolism2.title: Rapid Metabolism 2
rapidmetabolism2.text: This Defender shrugs off Debuffs 65% sooner.

rapidmetabolism3.title: Rapid Metabolism 3
rapidmetabolism3.text: This Defender shrugs off Debuffs 80% sooner.

recovery.title: Recovery
recovery.text: Healing and Regeneration abilities recover {0}% more health.

redoubleddetermination1.title: Redoubled determination-1
redoubleddetermination1.text: For Each Debuff, Defender gains +35% Attack and +10% Power Gain Rate. Bleed, Poison and Armor Break Debuffs count twice for this effect.

redoubleddetermination2.title: Redoubled determination-2
redoubleddetermination2.text: For Each Debuff, Defender gains +50% Attack and +15% Power Gain Rate. Bleed, Poison and Armor Break Debuffs count twice for this effect.

redoubleddetermination3.title: Redoubled determination-3
redoubleddetermination3.text: For Each Debuff, Defender gains +65% Attack and +20% Power Gain Rate. Bleed, Poison and Armor Break Debuffs count twice for this effect.

replicate.title: Replicate
replicate.text: Special attacks have a 90% chance to copy up to 2 effect(s).

resistor.title: Resistor
resistor.text: When struck with an Energy or Physical Attack, activate a corresponding Resistance Buff increasing respective Ressistance by 20%. When and Energy Resistance Buff is activated, remove a Physical Resistance Buff, and vice-versa.

resonancecascade.title: Resonance Cascade
resonancecascade.text: Critical Hists increase Critical Hit Rate by 100%

returnpolicy1.title: Return Policy - 1
returnpolicy1.text: Whenever any of the Defenders Buffs are Nullified they gain 20% of a bar of Power

returnpolicy2.title: Return Policy - 2
returnpolicy2.text: Whenever any of the Defenders Buffs are Nullified they gain 40% of a bar of Power

richgetricher.title: Rich Get Richer
richgetricher.text: Whichever Champion has more Unique Buffs gains {0}% of a bar of Power every second.

rollingthunder.title: Rolling Thunder
rollingthunder.text: This enemy raises Special Attack Damage by 10% for every 10 Seconds that pass

runningonfumes.title: Running On Fumes
runningonfumes.text: While close to the Defender, the Attacker gains a fatigue Debuff every 3 seconds, reducing their Critical Rating permanently. Staying far away from the Defender causes these Fatigues effects to gradually fall off.

sadist.title: Sadist
sadist.text: This Defender gains +{0}% Attack for each Debuff on them.

safeguard.title: Safeguard
safeguard.text: Prevents champion from losing more than 1% Health from a single source.

shatter.title: Shatter
shatter.text: Nullify abilities shatter theirt argets, dealing 1300 direct damage for each effect Nullified in this way.

shiftingimmunity.title: Shifting Immunity
shiftingimmunity.text: The Defender starts the fight with Bleed Immunity, which alternates every 10 second(s) eith Poison Immunity. When an Immunity triggers, it Purifies any corresponding effects.

slashedtires.title: Slashed Tires
slashedtires.text: Dashing backwards causes enemy to take 50% of your attack as direct damage.

softguard.title: Soft Guard
softguard.text: Each Blocked attack reduces Block Proficiency by 2%, up to a maximum of 80% reduction.

specialbias1.title: Special 1 Bias
specialbias1.text: This defender is more likely to activate Special Attack 1.

specialbias2.title: Special 2 Bias
specialbias2.text: This defender is more likely to activate Special Attack 2.

speciallock1.title: Special Lock 1
speciallock1.text: Attackers suffer from Power Lock after acquiring one bar of Power.

spiritofjustice.title: Spirit of Justice
spiritofjustice.text: Ghost Rider gains +50% Judgment Ability Accuracy.

spite.title: Spite
spite.text: While opponents has active Buffs, this champion activates Power Flood out of spite, granting 18% Power per second and Special Attacks a 100% chance to be Unblockable.

spry.title: Spry
spry.text: Each time the Defender Passively Evades an attack, a Fatigue Debuff is placed on the Attacker, reducing their Critical Rating by 1000 for 15 seconds.

stackeddeck.title: Stacked Deck
stackeddeck.text: Joe Fixit's Double Down ability becomes perminent

starburst.title: Starburst
starburst.text: Suffer Degeneration proportionate to this Champions's missing Health.

steadybuildup-fury.title: Steady Buildup - Fury
steadybuildup-fury.text: The Defender has 100% increased Defensive Ability Accuracy. When the Attacker has 3 or more Debuffs, the Defender gains a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 150% until the Attacker has 0 Debuffs. Whenever the Attacker Purifies a Debuff, they gain a Fury Passive, increasing Attack Rating by 100% for 10 second(s).

steadybuildup-unblockable.title: Steady Buildup - Unblockable
steadybuildup-unblockable.text: The Defender has 100% increased Defensive Ability Accuracy. When the Attacker has 3 or more Debuffs, the Defender becomes Unblockable until the Attacker has 0 Debuffs. Whenever the Attacker Purifies a Debuff, they become Unblockable for 7 second(s).

strike.title: True Strike
strike.text: Deffender's attacks ignore Armor, Resistance, and Evasion.

strikeback.title: Strike Back
strikeback.text: When damaged by a Special Attack, this enemy gains 1 bar of Power.

strikecounter-combatpowerrate.title: Strike counter - Combat Power Rate
strikecounter-combatpowerrate.text: The Attacker starts with 5 Light Charge(s), 4 Medium Charge(s), and 2 Heavy Charge(s). A Charge is removed whenever the Attacker lands a corresponding Attack, and all Charges are reset when the Attacker lands a Special Attack. When any Charge reaches 0, the Attacker's Power rate decreases over time until Charges are reset.

strikecounter-fury.title: Strike counter - Fury
strikecounter-fury.text: The Attacker starts with 3 Light Charge(s), 3 Medium Charge(s), and 2 Heavy Charge(s). A Charge is removed whenever the Attacker lands a corresponding Attack, and all Charges are reset when the Attacker lands a Special Attack. When any Charge reaches 0, the Defender gains Fury Passives over time until Charges are reset.

stun.title: Stun
stun.text: A 10% chance to inflict Stun for 1.5 seconds.

stungonce1.title: Stung Once, Twice Shy 1
stungonce1.text: When the Attacker gains a  Bar of Power, they are afflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 6 second(s).

stungonce2.title: Stung Once, Twice Shy 2
stungonce2.text: When the Attacker gains a  Bar of Power, they are afflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 4 second(s).

stungonce3.title: Stung Once, Twice Shy 3
stungonce3.text: When the Attacker gains a  Bar of Power, they are afflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 6 second(s).

stunimmune.title: Stun Immunity
stunimmune.text: The Defender is immune to the effects of Stun.

stupefy.title: Stupefy
stupefy.text: Increase the duration of Stun effects by 100%

supercharge.title: Supercharge
supercharge.text: Every 15 seconds the Defender activates a Power Gain Buff, granting 20% of their maximum Power over 10 seconds.

tenacity1.title: Tenacity 1
tenacity1.text: When inflicted with a Debuff, this Defender has a 25% chance to Purify the effect.

tenacity2.title: Tenacity 2
tenacity2.text: When inflicted with a Debuff, this Defender has a 50% chance to Purify the effect.

thebestdefence1.title: The Best Defence... 1
thebestdefence1.text: The Defender gains +20% Evade and Auto-Block Ability Accuracy. Triggering Evade or Auto-Block grants the Defender 10% of a Bar of Power.

thebestdefence2.title: The Best Defence... 2
thebestdefence2.text: The Defender gains X% Evade and Auto-Block Ability Accuracy. Triggering Evade or Auto-Block grants the Defender X% of a Bar of Power.

thebestdefence3.title: The Best Defence... 3
thebestdefence3.text: The Defender gains X% Evade and Auto-Block Ability Accuracy. Triggering Evade or Auto-Block grants the Defender X% of a Bar of Power.

thirdspecial.title: WARNING
thirdspecial.text: A third special attack has been activated!

thorns.title: Thorns
thorns.text: Retaliates with 15% attack as Physical Damage when struck by opponent.

toxicant_toxican.title: Toxicant? Toxi-can?
toxicant_toxican.text: Both the attacker and Defenders strikes have a 20% change to apply a poison Debuff, dealing 50% of their attack as Direct Damage over 10 seconds and reducing recovery rate by 30%

tranquility.title: Tranquility
tranquility.text: Every {0} seconds, all Buffs and Debuffs are removed from both Champions and both Champions are reset to 0 Power.

transducer.title: Transducer
transducer.text: The enemy rewards more power when struck, but its presence drains your power.

trialbyfire1.title: Trial By Fire 1
trialbyfire1.text: If the Defender is not strucked within 6 seconds the Attacker receives an Incinerate Debuff dealings 25% of the Defenders base attack as Direct Damage over 6 seconds.

trialbyfire2.title: Trial By Fire 2
trialbyfire2.text: If the Defender is not strucked within 4 seconds the Attacker receives an Incinerate Debuff dealings 50% of the Defenders base attack as Direct Damage over 4 seconds.

trialbyfire3.title: Trial By Fire 3
trialbyfire3.text: If the Defender is not strucked within 2 seconds the Attacker receives an Incinerate Debuff dealings 100% of the Defenders base attack as Direct Damage over 10 seconds.

tunnelvision.title: Tunnel Vision
tunnelvision.text: When the Attacker performs the same action twice in a row and they do not have a Falter Debuff applied to them from this Node, they have a 100% chance to gain a Falter Debuff, which causes them to Miss their next attack. When the Attacker's strikes Miss, this Falter Debuff is removed. Special Attacks do not count as actions towards this effect.

tyranny.title: Tyranny
tyranny.text: Villains in this arena attain absolute Power. Heroes do not gain Power.

unblockable_start.title: Unblockable
unblockable_start.text: All attacks are Unblockable for the first 6 seconds of the fight.

unlimitedpower.title: UNLIMITED POWER!
unlimitedpower.text: For each Debuff the Defender has suffered since the start of the fight, every 10 seconds they activate a permanent Fury Buff increasing their Attack by 25%. If these Fury Buffs are Nullified or removed in any way, the Defender gains 15% of their max Power for each Buff Nullified.

vigor.title: Vigor
vigor.text: Every 15 seconds after the start of the fight. Regenerate for 50% of Base Health over 5 seconds. The timer refreshes when the Champion reaches intervals of 25% missing Health.

vigorousassault.title: Vigorous Assault
vigorousassault.text: While the Defender has a Regen Buff active they gain +65% attack rating and their attacks become Unblockable.

villainy.title: Villainy
villainy.text: Villains in this arena periodically gain Cruelty, increasing Critical Damage by 250% for 7 seconds.

windowofopportunity-stun.title: Window of Opportunity - Stun
windowofopportunity-stun.text: The Defender starts the fight Stun Immune. Whenever they would be Stunned the Attacker is instead Stunned for 4 second(s). The Immunity lasts for 12 second(s), then goes on cooldown for 12 second(s) before returning. When the Immunity returns, it Purifies all Stun Debuffs on the Defender.
